thread.title: Jish
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by Jish

author: Jish
title: Jish
text: I got the best dry herb vaporizer I've used so far from this site, and I've tried many low quality vaped already. The vape I bought was the Xmax V2 Pro. I'd recommend it to anybody who wants a vape for weed or tobacco. It also came with a grinder and a little weed bottle for free. I r8 this service gr8/8, m8.
